<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2909</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Environmental awareness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimabewußtsein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conscience environnementale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Consciência ambiental</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Consapevolezza ambientale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιβαλλοντική συνειδητοποίηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conocimiento ambiental</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interactive online unit which teaches students how to respect the environment and about Reduce Reuse and Recycling of waste</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">online unit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">environmental science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recycling.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interaktive Onlinemaßeinheit, die 
Kursteilnehmern beibringt, wie man die Umgebung respektiert und 
ungefähr Wiederverwendung und die Abfallverwertung verringert</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une unité en ligne interactive qui enseigne à 
des étudiants comment respecter l'environnement et réduire environ 
la réutilisation et la réutilisation de la perte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma unidade em linha interativa que ensine a 
estudantes como respeitar o ambiente e reduzir aproximadamente reusar 
e recycling de desperdício</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'unità in linea interattiva che insegna ad 
allievi come rispettare l'ambiente e circa ridurre la riutilizzazione 
ed il riciclaggio dello spreco</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια διαλογική σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα που 
διδάσκει τους σπουδαστές πώς να σεβαστεί το περιβάλλον και για 
Reduce την επαναχρησιμοποίηση και την ανακύκλωση των αποβλήτων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una unidad en línea interactiva que enseña a 
estudiantes cómo respetar el ambiente y reducir alrededor la 
reutilización y el reciclaje de la basura</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinemaßeinheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klimawissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wiederverwertung.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité en ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la science environnementale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réutilisation.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade em linha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência ambiental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ecology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recycling.</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riciclaggio.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σε απευθείας σύνδεση μονάδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιβαλλοντική επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανακύκλωση.</string>
          </keyword>
